headline: Will Avery Dennison's (AVY) €497 Million Eurobond Issue Reshape Its Capital Allocation Strategy?
summary: Avery Dennison Corporation recently completed a €496.97 million fixed-rate senior unsecured Eurobond offering, issuing 4.000% callable notes due September 11, 2035 at a 0.45% discount. This sizable Euro-denominated fundraising signals heightened activity in the debt markets, providing additional liquidity and flexibility for the company’s future capital needs. We'll look at how this significant bond issuance may shape Avery Dennison’s investment case and forward capital allocation...
